title: Dubtronic - Free font from Astro Studios
content:
[
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120116065706im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typ_astrostudios_5178.png)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20120116065706/http:/bit.ly/aAILU)

The folks at [Astro Studios](http://web.archive.org/web/20120116065706/http:/www.astrostudios.com/), a San Francisco based industrial design agency, released a free, fat font, [Dubtronic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120116065706/http:/bit.ly/aAILU). They say they'll give a free shirt to the first 10 people who send them a design using the face.
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content: ???? I can't seem to find it.... :-(
yes, i just get a redirect as well.
I got it fine. I notified Astro and included a link to this thread.
